name: Final Yearn
description:
The world in it's entirety is ending.

There is no hope for mankind .

You are one of the last survivors, and now, you must choose your desire, follow your heart, and choose what you yearn for the most, will you follow your love, and spend your last moments with her, or will you attempt to survive, and be granted life, I wonder what you will end up pursuing.

Contains three levels, please complete all of them to get the full experience.

Was made with Game maker studio 2, and was made for the Cowboy's 100 Dollar Jam.

A music asset pack was used, link: https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1 .

Hope you have fun.

Made by (Discord name): Foxasdf, and Aroyaki.
